snippet: France joined Britain in urging its European Union partners to meet this month and take action to help the Syrian opposition.
abstract: France joins Britain in urging its European Union partners to end arms embargo on Syria, to allow weapons to be sent to opposition there.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Anne Barnard from Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: France joined Britain in urging its European Union partners to meet this month and take action to help the Syrian opposition.

headline.seo: To Aid Syria Rebels, France Urges End to Arms Embargo
headline.main: Seeking to Aid Rebels in Syria, France Urges End to Arms Embargo
headline.print_headline: Seeking to Aid Rebels In Syria, France Urges End to Arms Embargo
